nodes.text: Arhul Nemo was a male lieutenant in the Commenor Underground during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Around the year 10 BBY, he met the freedom fighter Saw Gerrera and his partisans, including the twelve-year-old Jyn Erso. Gerrera told Nemo that he had rescued Erso—who was Nemo's favorite member of the group—and raised her as his own. Nemo later reported the encounter to the intelligence agency of the Alliance to Restore the Republic and it was included in a dossier of information provided by General Airen Cracken to Chief of State Mon Mothma concerning Operation Fracture, a mission in which Erso was a vital asset.
Arhul Nemo was first mentioned in Star Wars: Rogue One: Rebel Dossier, a reference book written by Jason Fry and released on December 16, 2016.
